name: One Final Contract
description:
One Final Contact it's super low rez top down shooter, featuring wickedly fast firefights, and a procedurally generated levels. Challenge your reflexes as you dispatch hordes of enemies on your mission to take out the target high in the tower. Kill enemies in quick succession to maintain your cash multiplier, so you can purchase better weapons and defensive upgrades. Try not to die, or you will have to start all over again in a new procedurally generated building.


Are you up to the challenge? Features:
  • Super low rez graphics
  • Fast lethal combat
    • Firefights are over in seconds. Just make sure your still standing when they're over.
  • Wide variety of weapon
  • Procedurally generated levels
  • Challenging difficulty
  • Multiple starting weapons and difficulty settings
